Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to test|to put to the test
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities make an effort to obtain information about (other) humans by observing them while they engage in a certain activity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= the region inhabited by people who were regarded as descendants of Canaan, son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) settled by Abram (אַבְרָם)
literally: to know; hence: = process by which humans know what a certain experience is about by studying or living through it
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to know; hence: = process by which humans know what a certain experience is about by studying or living through it
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= person in charge of a Philistine city
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= descendant of Canaan (כְּנַעַן) son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) and inhabitant of the country named after them
= inhabitant of Sidon (צִידֹון)
= ethnic group; ◄ considered descendants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= town; ◄ territory of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town; ◄ located to the south of Hamath (חֲמָת) ► northern border of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= state in which humans are relatively young, ≈ which is sometimes associated with being weak and inexperienced, but also with being healthy

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= member of tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)|= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: closed on the right hand = left handed
Node.definition: = state of being relatively ineffective with the right hand when compared to the left; ≈ not necessarily regarded in a negative way

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: by the hand (of someone); hence: = process by which a certain event is carried out by an intermediary (person) or instrument (object)

= objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient
= man; ► king of Moab (מֹואָב) ► who oppressed Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and was killed by Ehud (אֵהוּד) time of judges
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

= man; ◄ son of Gera (גֵּרָא) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► left handed judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) who killed Eglon (עֶגְלֹון) king of Moab (מֹואָב) and led the Israelites in battle against the Moabites
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= the sharp side or end of a sword (חֶרֶב)
meaning unsure; probably: = linear measure, probably somewhat shorter than a cubit
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
